arabic: وَنَادٰى فِرْعَوْنُ فِيْ قَوْمِهٖ قَالَ يٰقَوْمِ اَلَيْسَ لِيْ مُلْكُ مِصْرَ وَهٰذِهِ الْاَنْهٰرُ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِيْۚ اَفَلَا تُبْصِرُوْنَۗ
transliteration_en: Wa naadaa Fir'awnu fee qawmihee qaala yaa qawmi alaisa lee mulku Misra wa haazihil anhaaru tajree min tahtee afalaa tubsiroon
transliteration_id: Wa nādā fir‘aunu fī qaumihī qāla yā qaumi alaisa lī mulku miṣra wa hāżihil-anhāru tajrī min taḥtī, afalā tubṣirūn(a).
translation_en: And Pharaoh called out among his people; he said, "O my people, does not the kingdom of Egypt belong to me, and these rivers flowing beneath me; then do you not see?
translation_id: Fir‘aun berseru kepada kaumnya (seraya) berkata, “Wahai kaumku, bukankah Kerajaan Mesir itu milikku dan (bukankah) sungai-sungai itu mengalir di bawah (istana-istana)-ku. Apakah kamu tidak melihat?

arabic: اَمْ اَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ هٰذَا الَّذِيْ هُوَ مَهِيْنٌ ەۙ وَّلَا يَكَادُ يُبِيْنُ
transliteration_en: Am ana khairum min haazal lazee huwa maheenunw wa laa yuakaadu yubeen
transliteration_id: Am ana khairum min hāżal-lażī huwa mahīn(un), wa lā yakādu yubīn(u).
translation_en: Or am I [not] better than this one who is insignificant and hardly makes himself clear?
translation_id: Bahkan, bukankah aku lebih baik daripada orang yang hina ini (Musa) yang hampir-hampir tidak dapat menjelaskan (maksud perkataannya)?

arabic: فَلَوْلَآ اُلْقِيَ عَلَيْهِ اَسْوِرَةٌ مِّنْ ذَهَبٍ اَوْ جَاۤءَ مَعَهُ الْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةُ مُقْتَرِنِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Falaw laa ulqiya 'alaihi aswiratum min zahabin awjaaa'a ma'ahul malaaa'ikatu muqtarineen
transliteration_id: Falau lā ulqiya ‘alaihi aswiratum min żahabin au jā'a ma‘ahul-malā'ikatu muqtarinīn(a).
translation_en: Then why have there not been placed upon him bracelets of gold or come with him the angels in conjunction?"
translation_id: Maka, mengapa tidak dipakaikan kepadanya (Musa) gelang dari emas atau malaikat datang bersama dia mengiringinya?”

arabic: فَاسْتَخَفَّ قَوْمَهٗ فَاَطَاعُوْهُ ۗاِنَّهُمْ كَانُوْا قَوْمًا فٰسِقِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Fastakhaffa qawmahoo fa ataa'ooh; innahum kaanoo qawman faasiqeen
transliteration_id: Fastakhaffa qaumahū fa aṭā‘ūh(u), innahum kānū qauman fāsiqīn(a).
translation_en: So he bluffed his people, and they obeyed him. Indeed, they were [themselves] a people defiantly disobedient [of Allah].
translation_id: Maka, dia (Fir‘aun) telah memengaruhi kaumnya sehingga mereka patuh kepadanya. Sesungguhnya mereka adalah kaum yang fasik.

arabic: فَلَمَّآ اٰسَفُوْنَا انْتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ فَاَغْرَقْنٰهُمْ اَجْمَعِيْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Falammaaa aasafoonan taqamnaa minhum fa aghraqnaahum ajma'een
transliteration_id: Falammā āsafūnantaqamnā minhum fa agraqnāhum ajma‘īn(a).
translation_en: And when they angered Us, We took retribution from them and drowned them all.
translation_id: Maka, ketika mereka telah membuat Kami murka, Kami hukum mereka, lalu Kami tenggelamkan mereka semuanya (di laut).

arabic: فَجَعَلْنٰهُمْ سَلَفًا وَّمَثَلًا لِّلْاٰخِرِيْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Faja'alnaahum salafanw wa masalal lil aakhireen
transliteration_id: Fa ja‘alnāhum salafaw wa maṡalal lil-ākhirīn(a).
translation_en: And We made them a precedent and an example for the later peoples.
translation_id: Maka, Kami jadikan mereka sebagai (kaum) terdahulu dan pelajaran bagi orang-orang yang kemudian.

arabic: ۞ وَلَمَّا ضُرِبَ ابْنُ مَرْيَمَ مَثَلًا اِذَا قَوْمُكَ مِنْهُ يَصِدُّوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa lammaa duribab nu Maryama masalan izaa qawmu ka minhu yasidoon
transliteration_id: Wa lammā ḍuribabnu maryama maṡalan iżā qaumuka minhu yaṣiddūn(a).
translation_en: And when the son of Mary was presented as an example, immediately your people laughed aloud.
translation_id: Ketika putra Maryam (Isa) dijadikan perumpamaan, tiba-tiba kaummu (suku Quraisy) bersorak karenanya.

arabic: وَقَالُوْٓا ءَاٰلِهَتُنَا خَيْرٌ اَمْ هُوَ ۗمَا ضَرَبُوْهُ لَكَ اِلَّا جَدَلًا ۗبَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ خَصِمُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa qaalooo 'a-aalihatunaa khairun am hoo; maa daraboohu laka illaa jadalaa; balhum qawmun khasimoon
transliteration_id: Wa qālū a'ālihatunā khairun am huw(a), mā ḍarabūhu laka illā jadalā(n), bal hum qaumun khaṣimūn(a).
translation_en: And they said, "Are your gods better, or is he?" They did not present the comparison except for [mere] argument. But, [in fact], they are a people prone to dispute.
translation_id: Mereka berkata, “Manakah yang lebih baik, tuhan-tuhan kami atau dia (Isa)?” Mereka tidak memberikan (perumpamaan itu) kepadamu, kecuali dengan maksud membantah saja. Sebenarnya mereka adalah kaum yang suka bertengkar.

arabic: اِنْ هُوَ اِلَّا عَبْدٌ اَنْعَمْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَجَعَلْنٰهُ مَثَلًا لِّبَنِيْٓ اِسْرَاۤءِيْلَ ۗ
transliteration_en: In huwa illaa 'abdun an'amnaa 'alaihi wa ja'alnaahu masalal li Baneee Israaa'eel
transliteration_id: In huwa illā ‘abdun an‘amnā ‘alaihi wa ja‘alnāhu maṡalal libanī isrā'īl(a).
translation_en: Jesus was not but a servant upon whom We bestowed favor, and We made him an example for the Children of Israel.
translation_id: Dia (Isa) tidak lain hanyalah seorang hamba yang Kami anugerahkan nikmat (kenabian) kepadanya dan Kami jadikan dia sebagai pelajaran (tanda kekuasaan Kami) bagi Bani Israil.

arabic: وَلَوْ نَشَاۤءُ لَجَعَلْنَا مِنْكُمْ مَّلٰۤىِٕكَةً فِى الْاَرْضِ يَخْلُفُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa law nashaaa'u laja'alnaa minkum malaaa'ikatan fil ardi yakhlufoon
transliteration_id: Wa lau nasyā'u laja‘alnā minkum malā'ikatan fil-arḍi yakhlufūn(a).
translation_en: And if We willed, We could have made [instead] of you angels succeeding [one another] on the earth.
translation_id: Seandainya Kami kehendaki, niscaya Kami jadikan malaikat sebagai penggantimu di bumi secara turun-temurun.

arabic: وَاِنَّهٗ لَعِلْمٌ لِّلسَّاعَةِ فَلَا تَمْتَرُنَّ بِهَا وَاتَّبِعُوْنِۗ هٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيْمٌ
transliteration_en: Wa innahoo la'ilmul lis Saa'ati fala tamtarunna bihaa wattabi'oon; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem
transliteration_id: Wa innahū la‘ilmul lis-sā‘ati falā tamtarunna bihā wattabi‘ūn(i), hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
translation_en: And indeed, Jesus will be [a sign for] knowledge of the Hour, so be not in doubt of it, and follow Me. This is a straight path.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya dia (Isa) itu benar-benar menjadi pertanda akan datangnya hari Kiamat. Oleh karena itu, janganlah sekali-kali kamu ragu tentang (kiamat) itu dan ikutilah (petunjuk)-Ku. Ini adalah jalan yang lurus.

arabic: وَلَا يَصُدَّنَّكُمُ الشَّيْطٰنُۚ اِنَّهٗ لَكُمْ عَدُوٌّ مُّبِيْنٌ
transliteration_en: Wa laa yasuddan nakumush Shaitaanu innahoo lakum 'aduwwum mubeen
transliteration_id: Wa lā yaṣuddannakumusy-syaiṭān(u), innahū lakum ‘aduwwum mubīn(un).
translation_en: And never let Satan avert you. Indeed, he is to you a clear enemy.
translation_id: Janganlah sekali-kali kamu dipalingkan oleh setan. Sesungguhnya ia merupakan musuh yang nyata bagimu.

arabic: وَلَمَّا جَاۤءَ عِيْسٰى بِالْبَيِّنٰتِ قَالَ قَدْ جِئْتُكُمْ بِالْحِكْمَةِ وَلِاُبَيِّنَ لَكُمْ بَعْضَ الَّذِيْ تَخْتَلِفُوْنَ فِيْهِۚ فَاتَّقُوا اللّٰهَ وَاَطِيْعُوْنِ
transliteration_en: Wa lammaa jaaa'a 'Eesaa bilbaiyinaati qaala qad ji'tukum bil Hikmati wa li-ubaiyina lakum ba'dal lazee takhtalifoona feehi fattaqul laaha wa atee'oon
transliteration_id: Wa lammā jā'a ‘īsā bil-bayyināti qāla qad ji'tukum bil-ḥikmati wa li'ubayyina lakum ba‘ḍal-lażī takhtalifūna fīh(i), fattaqullāha wa aṭī‘ūn(i).
translation_en: And when Jesus brought clear proofs, he said, "I have come to you with wisdom and to make clear to you some of that over which you differ, so fear Allah and obey me.
translation_id: Ketika Isa datang membawa bukti-bukti yang nyata, dia berkata, “Sungguh, aku datang kepadamu dengan membawa hikmah dan untuk aku jelaskan kepadamu sebagian dari apa yang kamu perselisihkan. Maka, bertakwalah kepada Allah dan taatilah aku.

arabic: اِنَّ اللّٰهَ هُوَ رَبِّيْ وَرَبُّكُمْ فَاعْبُدُوْهُۗ هٰذَا صِرَاطٌ مُّسْتَقِيْمٌ
transliteration_en: Innal laaha Huwa Rabbee wa Rabbukum fa'budooh; haaza Siraatum Mustaqeem
transliteration_id: Innallāha huwa rabbī wa rabbukum fa‘budūh(u), hāżā ṣirāṭum mustaqīm(un).
translation_en: Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path."
translation_id: Sesungguhnya Allah, Dialah Tuhanku dan Tuhanmu. Sembahlah Dia! Ini adalah jalan yang lurus.”

arabic: فَاخْتَلَفَ الْاَحْزَابُ مِنْۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۚفَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِيْنَ ظَلَمُوْا مِنْ عَذَابِ يَوْمٍ اَلِيْمٍ
transliteration_en: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu mim bainihim fawailul lillazeena zalamoo min 'azaabi Yawmin aleem
transliteration_id: Fakhtalafal-aḥzābu mim bainihim, fawailul lil-lażīna ẓalamūmin ‘ażābi yaumin alīm(in).
translation_en: But the denominations from among them differed [and separated], so woe to those who have wronged from the punishment of a painful Day.
translation_id: Golongan-golongan di antara mereka (Yahudi dan Nasrani) berselisih. Celakalah orang-orang yang zalim (karena) azab pada hari yang sangat pedih (kiamat).

arabic: هَلْ يَنْظُرُوْنَ اِلَّا السَّاعَةَ اَنْ تَأْتِيَهُمْ بَغْتَةً وَّهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Hal yanzuroona illas Saa'ata an taatiyahum baghtatanw wa hum laa yash'uroon
transliteration_id: Hal yanẓurūna illas-sā‘ata an ta'tiyahum bagtataw wa hum lā yasy‘urūn(a).
translation_en: Are they waiting except for the Hour to come upon them suddenly while they perceive not?
translation_id: Tidaklah mereka (orang-orang kafir) menunggu, kecuali hari Kiamat yang datang kepada mereka secara tiba-tiba, sedangkan mereka tidak menyadari(-nya).

arabic: اَلْاَخِلَّاۤءُ يَوْمَىِٕذٍۢ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍ عَدُوٌّ اِلَّا الْمُتَّقِيْنَ ۗ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Al akhillaaa'u Yawma'izim ba'duhum liba'din 'aduwwun illal muttaqeen
transliteration_id: Al-akhillā'u yauma'iżim ba‘ḍuhum liba‘ḍin ‘aduwwun illal-muttaqīn(a).
translation_en: Close friends, that Day, will be enemies to each other, except for the righteous
translation_id: Teman-teman akrab pada hari itu saling bermusuhan satu sama lain, kecuali orang-orang yang bertakwa.

arabic: يٰعِبَادِ لَاخَوْفٌ عَلَيْكُمُ الْيَوْمَ وَلَآ اَنْتُمْ تَحْزَنُوْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Yaa 'ibaadi laa khawfun 'alaikumul Yawma wa laaa antum tahzanoon
transliteration_id: Yā ‘ibādi lā khaufun ‘alaikumul-yauma wa lā antum taḥzanūn(a).
translation_en: [To whom Allah will say], "O My servants, no fear will there be concerning you this Day, nor will you grieve,
translation_id: (Dikatakan kepada mereka,) “Wahai hamba-hamba-Ku, tidak ada ketakutan bagimu pada hari ini (kiamat) dan tidak pula kamu bersedih.

arabic: اَلَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا وَكَانُوْا مُسْلِمِيْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Allazeena aamanoo bi Aayaatinaa wa kaanoo muslimeen
transliteration_id: Allażīna āmanū bi'āyātinā wa kānū muslimīn(a).
translation_en: [You] who believed in Our verses and were Muslims.
translation_id: (Yaitu) orang-orang yang beriman kepada ayat-ayat Kami dan mereka adalah orang-orang muslim.

arabic: اُدْخُلُوا الْجَنَّةَ اَنْتُمْ وَاَزْوَاجُكُمْ تُحْبَرُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Udkhulul Jannata antum wa azwaajukum tuhbaroon
transliteration_id: Udkhulul-jannata antum wa azwājukum tuḥbarūn(a).
translation_en: Enter Paradise, you and your kinds, delighted."
translation_id: Masuklah ke dalam surga, kamu dan pasanganmu (dalam keadaan) dibahagiakan.”

arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيْهِمْ بِصِحَافٍ مِّنْ ذَهَبٍ وَّاَكْوَابٍ ۚوَفِيْهَا مَا تَشْتَهِيْهِ الْاَنْفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ الْاَعْيُنُ ۚوَاَنْتُمْ فِيْهَا خٰلِدُوْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Yutaafu 'alaihim bishaa fim min zahabinw wa akwaab, wa feehaa maatashtaheehil anfusu wa talazzul a'yunu wa antum feehaa khaalidoon
transliteration_id: Yuṭāfu ‘alaihim biṣiḥāfim min żahabiw wa akwāb(in), wa fīhā mā tasytahīhil-anfusu wa talażżul-a‘yun(u), wa antum fīhā khālidūn(a).
translation_en: Circulated among them will be plates and vessels of gold. And therein is whatever the souls desire and [what] delights the eyes, and you will abide therein eternally.
translation_id: Kepada mereka diedarkan piring-piring dan gelas-gelas dari emas dan di dalamnya (surga) terdapat apa yang diingini oleh hati dan dipandang sedap oleh mata serta kamu kekal di dalamnya.

arabic: وَتِلْكَ الْجَنَّةُ الَّتِيْٓ اُوْرِثْتُمُوْهَا بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa tilkal jannatul lateee ooristumoohaa bimaa kuntum ta'maloon
transliteration_id: Wa tilkal-jannatul-latī ūriṡtumūhā bimā kuntum ta‘malūn(a).
translation_en: And that is Paradise which you are made to inherit for what you used to do.
translation_id: Itulah surga yang diwariskan kepada kamu disebabkan apa yang selama ini kamu kerjakan.

arabic: لَكُمْ فِيْهَا فَاكِهَةٌ كَثِيْرَةٌ مِّنْهَا تَأْكُلُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Lakum feehaa faakihatun kaseeratum minhaa taakuloon
transliteration_id: Lakum fīhā fākihatun kaṡīratum minhā ta'kulūn(a).
translation_en: For you therein is much fruit from which you will eat.
translation_id: Untukmu di dalamnya (surga) buah-buahan yang banyak yang sebagiannya kamu makan.

arabic: اِنَّ الْمُجْرِمِيْنَ فِيْ عَذَابِ جَهَنَّمَ خٰلِدُوْنَۖ
transliteration_en: Innal mujrimeena fee 'azaabi jahannama khaalidoon
transliteration_id: Innal-mujrimīna fī ‘ażābi jahannama khālidūn(a).
translation_en: Indeed, the criminals will be in the punishment of Hell, abiding eternally.
translation_id: Sesungguhnya para pendurhaka itu kekal di dalam azab (neraka) Jahanam.

arabic: لَا يُفَتَّرُ عَنْهُمْ وَهُمْ فِيْهِ مُبْلِسُوْنَ ۚ
transliteration_en: Laa yufattaru 'anhum wa hum feehi mublisoon
transliteration_id: Lā yufattaru ‘anhum wa hum fīhi mublisūn(a).
translation_en: It will not be allowed to subside for them, and they, therein, are in despair.
translation_id: Tidak diringankan (azab itu) dari mereka dan mereka berputus asa di dalamnya.

arabic: وَمَا ظَلَمْنٰهُمْ وَلٰكِنْ كَانُوْا هُمُ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa maa zalamnaahum wa laakin kaanoo humuz zaalimeen
transliteration_id: Wa mā ẓalamnāhum wa lākin kānū humuẓ-ẓālimīn(a).
translation_en: And We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.
translation_id: Tidaklah Kami menzalimi mereka, tetapi mereka adalah orang-orang zalim (terhadap dirinya).

arabic: وَنَادَوْا يٰمٰلِكُ لِيَقْضِ عَلَيْنَا رَبُّكَۗ قَالَ اِنَّكُمْ مّٰكِثُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa naadaw yaa Maaliku liyaqdi 'alainaa Rabbuka qaala innakum maakisson
transliteration_id: Wa nādau yā māliku liyaqḍi ‘alainā rabbuk(a), qāla innakum mākiṡūn(a).
translation_en: And they will call, "O Malik, let your Lord put an end to us!" He will say, "Indeed, you will remain."
translation_id: Mereka menyeru, “Wahai (Malaikat) Malik, hendaklah Tuhanmu mematikan kami saja.” Dia menjawab, “Sesungguhnya kamu akan tetap tinggal (di neraka ini).”

arabic: لَقَدْ جِئْنٰكُمْ بِالْحَقِّ وَلٰكِنَّ اَكْثَرَكُمْ لِلْحَقِّ كٰرِهُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Laqad ji'naakum bilhaqqi wa laakinna aksarakum lilhaqqi kaarihoon
transliteration_id: Laqad ji'nākum bil-ḥaqqi wa lākinna akṡarakum lil-ḥaqqi kārihūn(a).
translation_en: We had certainly brought you the truth, but most of you, to the truth, were averse.
translation_id: Sungguh, Kami benar-benar telah datang kepada kamu dengan (membawa) kebenaran, tetapi kebanyakan kamu benci kepada kebenaran itu.

arabic: اَمْ اَبْرَمُوْٓا اَمْرًا فَاِنَّا مُبْرِمُوْنَۚ
transliteration_en: Am abramooo amran fainnaa mubrimoon
transliteration_id: Am abramū amran fa innā mubrimūn(a).
translation_en: Or have they devised [some] affair? But indeed, We are devising [a plan].
translation_id: Bahkan, bukankah mereka telah merencanakan suatu tipu daya (jahat)? Sesungguhnya Kami telah berencana (mengatasi tipu daya mereka).

arabic: اَمْ يَحْسَبُوْنَ اَنَّا لَا نَسْمَعُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوٰىهُمْ ۗ بَلٰى وَرُسُلُنَا لَدَيْهِمْ يَكْتُبُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Am yahsaboona annaa laa nasma'u sirrahum wa najwaahum; balaa wa Rusulunaa ladaihim yaktuboon
transliteration_id: Am yaḥsabūna annā lā nasma‘u sirrahum wa najwāhum, balā wa rusulunā ladaihim yaktubūn(a).
translation_en: Or do they think that We hear not their secrets and their private conversations? Yes, [We do], and Our messengers are with them recording.
translation_id: Ataukah mereka mengira bahwa Kami tidak mendengar rahasia dan bisikan mereka? Sebenarnya (Kami mendengar) dan utusan-utusan Kami (malaikat) mencatat di sisi mereka.

arabic: قُلْ اِنْ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمٰنِ وَلَدٌ  ۖفَاَنَا۠ اَوَّلُ الْعٰبِدِيْنَ
transliteration_en: Qul in kaana lir Rahmaani walad; fa-ana awwalul 'aabideen
transliteration_id: Qul in kāna lir-raḥmāni walad(un), fa ana awwalul-‘ābidīn(a).
translation_en: Say, [O Muhammad], "If the Most Merciful had a son, then I would be the first of [his] worshippers."
translation_id: Katakanlah (Nabi Muhammad), “Jika benar Tuhan Yang Maha Pengasih mempunyai anak, akulah orang pertama yang menyembah (anak itu).

arabic: سُبْحٰنَ رَبِّ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ رَبِّ الْعَرْشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Subhaana Rabbis samaawaati wal ardi Rabbil Arshi 'ammaa yasifoon
transliteration_id: Subḥāna rabbis-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbil-‘arsyi ‘ammā yaṣifūn(a).
translation_en: Exalted is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
translation_id: Maha Suci Tuhan pemilik langit dan bumi, Tuhan pemilik ʻArasy, dari apa yang mereka sifatkan.”

arabic: فَذَرْهُمْ يَخُوْضُوْا وَيَلْعَبُوْا حَتّٰى يُلٰقُوْا يَوْمَهُمُ الَّذِيْ يُوْعَدُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Fazarhum yakhoodoo wa yal'aboo hattaa yulaaqoo Yawmahumul lazee yoo'adoon
transliteration_id: Fa żarhum yakhūḍū wa yal‘abū ḥattā yulāqū yaumahumul-lażī yū‘adūn(a).
translation_en: So leave them to converse vainly and amuse themselves until they meet their Day which they are promised.
translation_id: Maka, biarkanlah mereka tenggelam (dalam kesesatan) dan bermain-main (di dunia) sampai mereka menemui hari yang dijanjikan kepada mereka.

arabic: وَهُوَ الَّذِيْ فِى السَّمَاۤءِ اِلٰهٌ وَّ فِى الْاَرْضِ اِلٰهٌ ۗوَهُوَ الْحَكِيْمُ الْعَلِيْمُ
transliteration_en: Wa Huwal lazee fissamaaa'i Ilaahunw wa fil ardi Ilaah; wa Huwal Hakeemul'Aleem
transliteration_id: Wa huwal-lażī fis-samā'i ilāhuw wa fil-arḍi ilāh(un), wa huwal-ḥakīmul-‘alīm(u).
translation_en: And it is Allah who is [the only] deity in the heaven, and on the earth [the only] deity. And He is the Wise, the Knowing.
translation_id: Dialah Tuhan (yang disembah) di langit dan Tuhan (yang disembah) di bumi. Dialah Yang Maha Bijaksana lagi Maha Mengetahui.

arabic: وَتَبٰرَكَ الَّذِيْ لَهٗ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۚوَعِنْدَهٗ عِلْمُ السَّاعَةِۚ وَاِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa tabaarakal lazee lahoo mulkus samaawaati wal ardi wa maa bainahumaa wa 'indahoo 'ilmus Saa'ati wa ilaihi turja'oon
transliteration_id: Wa tabārakal-lażī lahū mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍi wa mā bainahumā, wa ‘indahū ‘ilmus-sā‘ah(ti), wa ilaihi turja‘ūn(a).
translation_en: And blessed is He to whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them and with whom is knowledge of the Hour and to whom you will be returned.
translation_id: Maha Berkah (Allah) yang memiliki kerajaan langit dan bumi serta apa yang ada di antara keduanya. Di sisi-Nyalah ilmu tentang hari Kiamat dan hanya kepada-Nyalah kamu dikembalikan.

arabic: وَلَا يَمْلِكُ الَّذِيْنَ يَدْعُوْنَ مِنْ دُوْنِهِ الشَّفَاعَةَ اِلَّا مَنْ شَهِدَ بِالْحَقِّ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُوْنَ
transliteration_en: Wa laa yamlikul lazeena yad'oona min doonihish shafaa'ata illaa man shahida bilhaqqi wa hum ya'lamoon
transliteration_id: Wa lā yamlikul-lażīna yad‘ūna min dūnihisy-syafā‘ata illā man syahida bil-ḥaqqi wa hum ya‘lamūn(a).
translation_en: And those they invoke besides Him do not possess [power of] intercession; but only those who testify to the truth [can benefit], and they know.
translation_id: Sembahan-sembahan mereka selain Dia tidak bisa memberi syafaat (pertolongan di akhirat), kecuali orang yang bersaksi dengan yang hak (tauhid) dan mereka meyakininya.

arabic: وَلَىِٕنْ سَاَلْتَهُمْ مَّنْ خَلَقَهُمْ لَيَقُوْلُنَّ اللّٰهُ فَاَنّٰى يُؤْفَكُوْنَۙ
transliteration_en: Wa la'in sa altahum man khalaqahum la yaqoolun nallaahu fa annaa yu'fakoon
transliteration_id: Wa la'in sa'altahum man khalaqahum layaqūlunnallāhu fa annā yu'fakūn(a).
translation_en: And if you asked them who created them, they would surely say, "Allah." So how are they deluded?
translation_id: Jika engkau bertanya kepada mereka, siapakah yang menciptakan mereka, niscaya mereka menjawab, “Allah.” Maka, mengapa mereka bisa dipalingkan?

arabic: وَقِيْلِهٖ يٰرَبِّ اِنَّ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ قَوْمٌ لَّا يُؤْمِنُوْنَۘ
transliteration_en: Wa qeelihee yaa Rabbi inna haa'ulaaa'i qawmul laa yu'minoon
transliteration_id: Wa qīlihī yā rabbi inna hā'ulā'i qaumul lā yu'minūn(a).
translation_en: And [Allah acknowledges] his saying, "O my Lord, indeed these are a people who do not believe."
translation_id: Demi (kebenaran) ucapannya (Nabi Muhammad), “Ya Tuhanku, sesungguhnya mereka itu adalah kaum yang tidak beriman.”

arabic: فَاصْفَحْ عَنْهُمْ وَقُلْ سَلٰمٌۗ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُوْنَ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Fasfah 'anhum wa qul salaam; fasawfa ya'lamoon
transliteration_id: Faṣfaḥ ‘anhum wa qul salām(un), fa saufa ya‘lamūn(a).
translation_en: So turn aside from them and say, "Peace." But they are going to know.
translation_id: Maka, berpalinglah dari mereka dan katakanlah, “Salam (selamat tinggal).” Kelak mereka akan mengetahui (nasibnya yang buruk).
